page.title: Apple AirPort Extreme Base Station A1143 (MB053LL/A)

revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Apple |model=A1143 |revision=(MB053LL/A) |upc=885909171057 |asin=B000UZCR56 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |availability=common |price=179 |est_release_date=08/2007 |fcc_date=08/08/2007 |fcc_id=BCGA1143 |ic_id=579C-A1143 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=3.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F5281 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=STMicro |fla1_model=M29W128FL |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4H561638H-UCB3 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_module=Atheros AR5BMB-0072TA |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5416 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR5133 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5395 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=3 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn |addl_chips=Zero-Delay Clock Buffer;Pericom;PI6C2405A;;1;,,, Current Limited Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2051B;;1;,,, 3A, 3-6V Synchronous Buck PWM Switcher;TI;TPS54310;;4;,,, 12-bit to 24-bit Multiplexed D-Type Latch;TI;ALVCH162260;;1;,,, Hex Buffer/Driver with Open-Drain Outputs;TI;SN74LVC07A;;1;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Vishay;Si4944DY;;1;,,, 1A LDO Regulator;Semtech;SC4211;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery |oui=00:1F:F3, 00:19:E3 |oui_eth=00:1F:F3, 00:16:C8 }} {{TagLine|Apple AirPort Extreme Base Station A1143}}
The device uses three antennas. The MIMO configuration is assumed to be 3x3. :Manuf. by [[Foxconn]]
Note: Per the Class II permissive change request submitted to the FCC, this model differs from :MA073LL/A in that the processor was changed to the 88F5281, the switch was changed to :the BCM5397, and the Ethernet CM filter was changed from 824-00339R to 824-M0312R.
*[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AirPort AirPort devices on Wikipedia]
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/30188-apple-airport-extreme-reviewed-dual-band-draft-11n-for-everyone Reviewed on SmallNetBuilder] *[http://www.amazon.com/Apple-AirPort-Extreme-Station-MB053LL/dp/B000UZCR56 On Amazon.com] (reviews)
